page.title: 06HOUSES IN LANGENHOE AREA
page.content:
In this area there are few houses outside the village of{Abberton and {Langenhoe.}Originally the village of {Langenhoe}was centred around the Church, which is no longer standing, but its site is to the south of the present village. A new housing estate was built in the 1970's in{Abberton. Many of the children who attend {Langenhoe School}live on this estate.
Until the early part of the 20th century, there were some cottages on the marshes, probably belonging to fishermen.
Apart from a few houses and bungalows on the main road, there are now only a few large houses, most of which are farm houses.{Sir A. Buck,}Conservative M.P. for{Colchester North,}lives in this area.
